The CEO rush-signed a secret contract using a weak RSA scheme. Only the signature "0x4c79725e515d747f1063de37c47b9c0cddd1df27008fb2adac850c6d7212243efb9bd328586139af0c42ab2b0e6fd4bb30564f28d3a338d875daa9d94e50a01b" was leaked. Can you recover the original message?

Public Key (n, e): (8510615709545801973714287979636582414048661206320646244424708662239691104221278167152922273842775603014561684637090898027363627434786583929380089790071003, 3)

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{3ujm7rmp}
ciphertext: 0x4c79725e515d747f1063de37c47b9c0cddd1df27008fb2adac850c6d7212243efb9bd328586139af0c42ab2b0e6fd4bb30564f28d3a338d875daa9d94e50a01b
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (8510615709545801973714287979636582414048661206320646244424708662239691104221278167152922273842775603014561684637090898027363627434786583929380089790071003, 3)
